name: Snakes and Ladders (itch) (samwgames)
description:
Snakes and Ladders

Play a classic  game of the Snakes and Ladders, or with one of three other game modes.

Game modes:

  • Classic: a standard Snakes and Ladders game. Start from 1, move up to 100. If you land on a snake, you move down. If you land on a ladder, you move up.
  • Reverse: start from 100 and move down to 1. If you land on a snake, you move down. If you land on a ladder, you move up.
  • Blind: the snakes, ladders and board numbers have been removed.
  • Headstart: all players are given random numbers to start on the board. If you land on a snake, you move down. If you land on a ladder, you move up.
